title: All You Need To Know Going Into Trade On Thursday
description: The benchmark stock market indices fell for a fourth day straight with Nifty slipping below 26,000 mark to close 0.18% lower at 25986. While the Sensex settled flat at 85106.81.  Nifty December futures down to 26,142 at a premium of 156 points. Nifty December…
content:
• Asian Granito India: Board approved the proposal to buy 26% stake in Allomex steel.
  • Eris Lifesciences: Company expects sharp EPS turnaround from FY26. Total Rs 380400 crore capex over n… [+3875 chars]
